name: Prosect
description:
Made for HUJAM #2 in 72 hours

You are a planetary scientist currently on a mission to retrieve the recently discovered artifacts from nearby planets. 

Jam Edition Bugs

  • Flashlight is completely bugged, it does not turn to the correct position when you pick it up.
  • You may lose the artifact when you change scenes while holding it, restart the game if so.
  • After you enter the correct keycode the game should end.

Assets Used

  • Unity Starter Assets for the basic first person locomotion.
  • Amplify Shader for the artifact shader.
  • Cyberpunk Material Pack for some indoor materials.
  • Skybox Series by Avionx for the space skybox.
  • Pixabay for all the sound effects.

Team

beamed8 - Developer

Gobormu - 3D Artist & Level Design
